dateCreated.description: Date that the order was created

status.description: Current status: starts at CART; when ordered, PROCESSING; when all items shipped, COMPLETE. If deleted/cancelled: CLOSED

totalCost.description: Total cost of all orderItems SUM(unitCost * quantity)

orderItems.description: Array of order items: if status=CART then this array tracks items as they are added, removed or updated.
